item.title: Intelligent Asset Allocation
item.description: This is a MVP(Minimal Viable Product) of asset allocation web application, which can help users build their stock portfolio using model like Black-litterman.

item.title: Sngan Projection
item.description:
Using SNGAN and Projection Discriminator to make food images!

The dataset used to train is Food-101

item.title: Mask Search
item.description:
This is a mask searching website that provides user with the visualized data of how many mask remain in each county of Taiwan. User can also type the store name or location to search for the stores and check the mask stocks. Hoping this may help any people in Taiwan to buy mask and keep the virus away.

There are two parts of this project:

FrontEnd Website and BackEnd Server

Note: The language of webiste is Chinese.

item.title: PGGAN Tensorflow
item.description: This project is the TF2.0 implementation of Progressive Growing of GANs for Improved Quality, Stability, and Variation.

item.title: TD3 Pytorch
item.description: This project is a Pytorch implentation of TD3. The paper can be found here Addressing Function Approximation Error in Actor-Critic Methods by Scott Fujimoto, Herke van Hoof and David Meger.

item.title: Tucana Neural Style
item.description:
This website includes three kinds of transformations.

Fast Neural Style

The fast neural style implementation is based on fast-neural-style-keras by misgod, We made some changes to it, and this method is base on Perceptual Losses for Real-Time Style Transfer and Super-Resolution by Johnson et al.

In the current version, We replace some of the Conv2D layer to Depth-wise separable convolutions in the image transformation net.

Style Swap

The style swap layer is from WCT-TF by eridgd, the original paper is Fast Patch-based Style Transfer of Arbitrary Style by Chen et al.

Mask Style

We use Mask R-CNN which is implemented by matterport, the original paper of Mask R-CNN is Mask R-CNN by He et al.

item.title: Kuzushiji Recognition
item.description: This repo contains the jupyter notebook solution of kuzushiji recognition, we separate the recognition task into the detection part and the classification part.
